member.name: M:StressDataAnalyzer.DataAnalyzer.Window_Loaded(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary:
Event-handling method for the Loaded event of the WPF window.
This method calls readTestData to read in the test data and populate the binary tree with the results.

member.name: M:StressDataAnalyzer.DataAnalyzer.ReadTestData
member.summary: Method that reads the test data from the file specified by the stressDataFileName string and creates the stressData binary tree using this data.

member.name: M:StressDataAnalyzer.DataAnalyzer.DisplayResultsButton_Click(System.Object,System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)
member.summary:
Event-handling method for the Click event of the displayResults button.
This method retrieves the query criteria entered by the user on the form and then calls the CreateQuery method to generate an enumerable result set.
The results are formatted by using the FormatResults method, and are then displayed in the results TextBox control on the form.

members.member:
Method that generates an enumerable collection of TestResult items from the stressData binary tree, based on the criteria and sort key specified by the user. All data fetched will fall within the range specified by these criteria.
A boolean that indicates whether the specified criteria for the test date data.
The start date criterion.
The end date criterion.
A boolean that indicates whether the specified criteria for the temperature data.
The lower temperature criterion,
The upper temperature criterion.
A boolean that indicates whether the specified criteria for the applied stress data.
The lower applied stress criterion.
The upper applied stress criterion.
A boolean that indicates whether the specified criteria for the deflection data.
The lower deflection criterion.
The upper deflection criterion.
The sort key. Data will be retrieved in ascending order of this key.
An IEnumerable<TestResult> object that can be used to iterate through the results.

member.name: M:StressDataAnalyzer.DataAnalyzer.FormatResults(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{StressTestResult.TestResult})
member.summary: Fetch the data defined by the LINQ query specified as the parameter and format the results as a string.
member.returns: A formatted string that contains the data fetched by the query.

member.name: M:StressDataAnalyzer.DataAnalyzer.BuildLambdaExpressionForQueryCriteria(System.Boolean,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Boolean,System.Int16,System.Int16,System.Boolean,System.Int16,System.Int16,System.Boolean,System.Int16,System.Int16)
member.summary: Method that dynamically generates a lambda expression that matches the query criteria specified by the user.
member.param: A boolean. It is true if the user specified a date range for filtering data.
The lower value of the date range, if specified.
The upper value of the date range, if specified.
A boolean. It is true if the user specified a temperature range for filtering data.
The lower value of the temperature range, if specified.
The upper value of the temperature range, if specified.
A boolean. It is true if the user specified an applied stress range for filtering data.
The lower value of the applied stress range, if specified.
The upper value of the applied stress range, if specified.
A boolean. It is true if the user specified a deflection range for filtering data.
The lower value of the deflection range, if specified.
The upper value of the deflection range, if specified.
member.returns: An Expression that defines a lambda expression that filters data using the criteria specified by the user, or null if the user did not specify any query criteria.

member.name: M:StressDataAnalyzer.DataAnalyzer.BuildDateExpressionBody(System.Boolean,System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Type,System.Linq.Expressions.ParameterExpression)
member.summary: Method that builds the boolean expression that evaluates criteria specified for the date range.
member.param: Boolean value that indicates whether the user specified a date range.
The start date specified by the user.
The end date specified by the user.
The type of the TestResult structure holding the TestDate property
The parameter passed in to the lambda expression containing the item in the TestResult collection being examined.
member.returns: A boolean Expression object, or null if the user did not specify a date range.

member.name: M:StressDataAnalyzer.DataAnalyzer.BuildLambdaExpressionForOrderBy(StressDataAnalyzer.OrderByKey)
member.summary: Method that generates a lambda expression that defines the order for presenting data.
member.param: A member of the OrderByKey enumeration. It specifies the key to order the data, or None if the user wants to use the default order of the TestResult type
member.returns: An Expression that defines a lambda expression that orders data by the column specified by the user, or null if the user has not specified a field to order by.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
